author: diana_fulbright
post: Dear Casabianca Tristan, As an historian, I would like to read your article assessing the historicity of the Turin Shroud. The Heythrop Journal allows acces only to subscribers or via payment by non subscribers. Will you kindly send a copy of your paper to me at sindon@globalweb.net, perhaps with permission to make it available to SSG members, or you might ask Dan to publish the paper on his blog. Many thanks. Diana Fulbright.
